lead_paragraph: A woman and her daughter were rescued nearly 20 miles from where they launched a kayak in Connecticut, after they and two men were blown offshore.

headline.print_headline: Sunset Ride on Windy L.I. Sound Is Fatal
headline.main: Sunset Ride Turns Deadly for 2 on Windy Long Island Sound

snippet: A woman and her daughter were rescued nearly 20 miles from where they launched a kayak in Connecticut, after they and two men were blown offshore.
abstract: Damaris Reynoso of Connecticut and her daughter Delfina Reynoso are rescued from Long Island beach after heading out into Long Island Sound by kayak with companions Abdias Ventura and Ferdinand Lagos, who were later found dead by Coast Guard; foursome were overwhelmed by high winds.
